pages.text: $(o)Heh, did I get you? Sorry, I already know I did -- you couldn't read this otherwise. $(br2)I know, I know, how immature to take advantage of your ignorance like this. However, I did have $(thing)a good reason$(0). It's pretty funny, isn't it? Sorry about the Crucible, but you can spare a few iron and glow sacs, right?

$(o)I hope nothing burned down... Hm, now I feel kind of bad. Tell you what, I'll give you a hint in return. This one's not a trick. $(4)Spirits that pass near to an Iron Symbol are damaged.$(0) Why? How should I know?? This is barely even a science. Anyway, best of luck have fun stay safe etc.
